channel.title: The Ghost (Neutral Killer)
channel.description:
A Neutral Killer that isn't outed to the evil faction as easily by being death immune or surviving attacks.
># The Ghost >Neutral Killer > >**Intangible (Passive) -** You may perform night actions while imprisoned, and may visit imprisoned players. > >**Vanish (Day) -** Transfer bleeds and delayed deaths to someone else, and redirect anyone who visits you tonight to them. >**Boo! (Night) -** Scare someone to death and occupy them. If they are immune to death, remove their immunity instead.

item.title: The Ghost (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Revised.

The Ghost

Neutral Killer

Intangible (Passive) - You may perform night actions while imprisoned, and may visit imprisoned players.

Vanish (Day) - Transfer bleeds and delayed deaths to someone else, and redirect anyone who visits you tonight to them.
Haunt (Day) - Learn if someone was safe from death last night (immune, healed, or defended).

Boo! (Night) - Scare someone to death, or remove their death immunity.

Read full topic

item.title: The Ghost (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
somehow I forgot about that

@Diggity69 sadly I think that’s too close to Reaper

Read full topic

item.title: The Ghost (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Diggity69
item.description:
The Ghost

Neutral Killer

Intangible (Passive) - You may perform night actions while imprisoned, and may visit imprisoned players.

Ghosting (Passive) - You are secretly death immune, a Knight’s Defend cannot kill you, and the first time the prince uses Execute on you, it will fail.

Vanish (Day) - Transfer bleeds and delayed deaths to someone else, and redirect anyone who visits you tonight to them. (2 uses, gain a use for every immunity you removed)

Terrorize (Day) - Silence a player for the rest of the day, blocking their voting. They cannot write in their logs.

Unworldly Terror (Night) - Scare someone to death and occupy them. If they are immune to death, remove their immunity instead.

Grave Ritual (Night) - Select two players instead of one to kill tonight, bypassing death immunity.

Read full topic

item.title: The Ghost (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
This class would also need some oomph to close out the game. Possessor, Reaper have vote manipulation and Sorcerer has Arsonist Ignite.

item.title: The Ghost (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: anon97870008
item.description:
There are iirc no abilities anymore at all which allow you to bypass occ/redirectimmunity, with exception of Hunter’s Mark, but that’s a bug

(* with exception of Prince, of course, thx Solic)

Read full topic

item.title: The Ghost (Neutral Killer)

item.description:
That could be solved with silent bypassing redirection immunity though, but silent redirection is uhh contentious.

item.title: The Ghost (Neutral Killer)

Oof I’m ancient.

Guess I better queue up some games again.

Read full topic

item.title: The Ghost (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: anon97870008
item.description:
In fact… nope, not in 2k19.
The NKs are not occ/redirectimmune anymore. But there are quite some ways to become an occimmune killer.
Invoker > CL
Any occimmune class > CL/Assassin
Being 3 nights at least one of this: redirected/occed/jailed

Also Knight guards/Hunter bears can kill you.

Read full topic

item.title: The Ghost (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Yea, but that’s typically only the … NK.

Read full topic

item.title: The Ghost (Neutral Killer)

item.description:
Just have a redirect-immune killer, and you are dead.

item.title: The Ghost (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Shrimpy:

Vanish (Day) - Transfer bleeds and delayed deaths to someone else, and redirect anyone who visits you tonight to them.

anon97870008:

You can be found by attacks… because you are dead then.

Regardless it is not that much different from explicitly finding death immunity.

Read full topic

item.title: The Ghost (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: anon97870008
item.description:
You can be found by attacks… because you are dead then.
To say it with the words of someone else, your abilities overall are at least 50 times worse than the ones of the Sorcerer (who’s already considered as the weakest NK by many)
